questions.question: Self-discipline is best understood as:
options: Forcing yourself to do things you hate
The capacity to act according to your values despite short-term discomfort

questions.question: Willpower is:
options: A limited resource that depletes with use
Something you either have or don't

questions.question: The most effective approach to lasting behavior change is:
options: Building habits and systems that automate good behavior

questions.question: Environment design works because:
options: It removes the need for willpower by making good choices easier
It forces you to be disciplined

questions.question: When you fail at discipline:
options: Learn from it, adjust, and continue
